```js
class PageSpinnerExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { show: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Button
          onClick={() => {
            this.setState(state => ({ show: !state.show }));
            setTimeout(() => this.setState({ show: false }), 5000);
          }}
        >
          Show for 5 seconds
        </Button>
        <PageSpinner show={this.state.show} />
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<PageSpinnerExample />;
```
